Method Detail

write

public void write(byte[] array)
Writes one chunk into stream: Takes the chunk content (chunk-data) as parameter, packages content into chunk according to RFC2616 (see below), and writes chunk into stream.

If a byte array with size zero is given, the chunk is taken to be the last-chunk: Method writes chunk size and closes stream to free up resources.

Method blocks if size of array is greater than maxChunkSize!

Attention: chunk-extension and trailer are not supported so far and are ignored!

Chunks according to RFC2616:

Chunked-Body = *chunk last-chunk trailer CRLF

chunk = chunk-size [ chunk-extension ] CRLF chunk-data CRLF

chunk-size = 1*HEX last-chunk = 1*("0") [ chunk-extension ] CRLF

chunk-extension= *( ";" chunk-ext-name [ "=" chunk-ext-val ] )

chunk-ext-name = token chunk-ext-val = token | quoted-string

chunk-data = chunk-size(OCTET)

trailer = *(entity-header CRLF)

Specified by:
write in class HTTPXOutputStream
Parameters:
array - - content of chunk (chunk-data) to be written to stream as byte array.
See Also:
or HTTPXChunkedOutputStream

writeBuffered

public void writeBuffered(byte[] array)
                   throws ContentConvertingException,
                          java.io.IOException
Writes byte array into stream, starts a new thread. Byte array is splitted into chunks according to maxChunkSize.

Specified by:
writeBuffered in class HTTPXOutputStream
Parameters:
array - - payload to be chunked and written to stream. A byte array with size zero indicates end of payload and closes stream to free up resources.
Throws:
ContentConvertingException
java.io.IOException
See Also:
or HTTPXChunkedOutputStream

constructHTTPXActionMessage

public HTTPXActionMessage constructHTTPXActionMessage(java.lang.String method,
                                                      java.lang.String protocol,
                                                      java.lang.String host,
                                                      int port,
                                                      Path path,
                                                      ParameterList query,
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
Description copied from class: HTTPXOutputStream
Constructs a new httpx action message according to type of stream (either plain or chunked input stream). Adds especially the necessary headers for the streams.

Specified by:
constructHTTPXActionMessage in class HTTPXOutputStream
Parameters:
method - - POST, GET, PUT, DELETE, HEAD
protocol - - protocol to be used
host - - destination host
port - - dest port
path - - dest path
query - - dest query
headers - - headers so far (method just appends necessary headers like Content-Type to headers and does not overwrite them, the only exception is Content-Length which is deleted if stream is chunked according to RFC2616)
Returns:
HTTPXActionMessage
